topHeroBanner.title: Get to know Ignite TV.
topHeroBanner.subtitle: Curious about Ignite TV<sub>TM</sub>, our IPTV service? Here’s everything you need to know.
topHeroBanner.description: All-in-one search. A slick Voice Remote. Customized content powered by our fastest internet, meaning you can watch TV online. Built-in apps like Netflix and YouTube. Check out this video to get to know Ignite TV and how it works.

iptv3Columns.title: IPTV (Internet Protocol TV) is delivered completely through the internet, instead of via traditional digital or satellite networks. Which means:

content.title: Seamless watching across multiple devices – even on the go.
content.description: Start a movie on your TV and finish it on your tablet. Watch live TV on the go. Use Cloud PVR and Download & Go to access your recordings from anywhere.

content.title: Ultimate flexibility and control of your TV.
content.description: Fast-forward, rewind and restart live shows. Customize your channel line-up whenever you want.
content.imageAlt: Flexibility and control of your TV.

content.title: Multiple content sources at your fingertips, from live TV to Netflix.
content.description: Search for a movie, genre or actor and browse results from across live TV, Netflix, On Demand, your recordings and more.

content.title: All-in-One Search
content.description: Easily find all of your entertainment across live TV, On Demand, Netflix and more with one simple search.

content.title: Netflix and YouTube Integration
content.description: Ignite TV allows you to easily search and watch your favourites on Netflix and YouTube. Simply say what you’re looking for into the voice remote and start watching it in seconds, all without changing inputs or using other devices.
content.imageAlt: Image of Netflix and YouTube Integration

content.title: Voice Remote with Voice Controls
content.description:
Use the power of your voice to quickly and effortlessly control your home entertainment experience all in seconds.Change Channels
Set and manage PVR Recordings
Find TV Shows & Movies
Find Special Events
Search Live TV, Netflix, YouTube, and more
Get local weather
content.imageAlt: Image of Voice Remote with Voice Controls

content.title: Flex Channels and Channel Exchange
content.description: Customize your channel line-up so that it’s right for you. Choose the channels you watch and exchange them for the ones you don’t.
content.imageAlt: Image of Flex Channels and Channel Exchange

content.title: Sports App
content.description: Your own personalized sports hub where you can set your favourite teams and leagues. Plus view scores, stats, standings, and more – all in real time!

content.title: KidsZone
content.description: Puts kids and parents in command in a safe and fun digital space with age-appropriate content and parental controls.

content.title: Restart program
content.description: Restart a live program while it's on, or immediately after it airs.

content.title: Cloud PVR
content.description: Watch your PVR recordings wherever you are. Watch at home on the big screen with your Ignite TV box or on the go with the Ignite TV app.

content.title: Stream at home & on the go
content.description: Stream live TV, On Demand, and  your Cloud PVR recordings from your smartphone, tablet, and laptop. No Wifi? No Problem! You can even download your Cloud PVR recordings and watch them without WiFi with Download & Go.
content.imageAlt: Image of Stream at home & on the go

content.title: Wireless Hardware
content.description: The Ignite TV Box is small, sleek  and powerful with 4K picture quality. It works off of WiFi, so it can go anywhere in your home where there is a power outlet.

videos.title: All your favourites in one place.
videos.description: With Ignite TV’s All-in-one Search, it’s never been easier to find the content you want to watch. For example, search for "Tim Burton", and show and movie options related to the director will display from across live TV, Netflix and more.

videos.title: Control your TV with your voice.
videos.description: The Voice Remote lets you explore your content using voice commands, which means less searching, more watching. You can also use voice commands to change channels, set recordings, rewind, play songs and more – the possibilities are endless.

videos.title: Take your movies and shows to go.
videos.description: Who says you need to watch TV on your TV? With Download & Go, you can download your recordings or purchases to your mobile device – so you can take your entertainment wherever you go, even offline.

videos.title: Your personalized sports hub.
videos.description: SportsApp takes you to the front row of your favourite games without leaving your couch. Set your favourite leagues and teams, keep track of live scores and stats, watch game highlights and lots more.

videos.title: A playroom on your TV for the kids.
videos.description: KidsZone is a safe space for the little ones to discover and watch age-appropriate content. And with fully customizable parental controls, KidsZone means more fun for kids and far less worry for parents.
